title: Is riot banning people who crash on the new client?

replies.body: LeaverBuster is still in place to ensure that anyone with issues on the new client works to resolve them before entering more games. Without LeaverBuster, more than likely, you'll see a relatively high number of imbalanced matches. However, if you are having issues, we're here to help! Give us as much information as you can, and we'll get back to you with potential solutions.

Hey there,

No? What makes you think this?
